item.title: Hugo Theme Yuki
item.description: Yuki ❄️ Hugo theme yuki. She is as pure as the snow. Features Responsive Syntax highlighting with highlightjs Social links（Customize） Custom Pages Support for Related Content Support for tags Google Analytics SCSS Table of Contents Quick Start Usage Development License Quick Start In your hugo site directory, run: $ mkdir themes $ cd themes $ git clone https://github.com/iCyris/hugo-theme-yuki Usage Use hugo’s -t hugo-theme-yuki or –theme=hugo-theme-yuki option with hugo commands.
